page.title: 08HOBBIES IN HARDWICK
page.content: Although the area boasts fishing and canoeing facilities, nature walks, and an historic building, the main recreational pastime of the local population was watching the {television!}Along with this many people were members of{evening {classes, keep-fit classes}and enjoyed sport-{cricket}and{badminton}were popular. Local organisations, such as the{Young Farmers Club,}the{Women's {Institute}and the{Heritage Society were also enjoyed. Travel, however, is usually necessary in order to participate in all of these things. { Gardening}was a favourite pastime and summer means that many people spend their evenings{outdoors. Visiting}and {going out with friends were popular, as were{knitting}and{sewing.}Time spent with their{children-reading}and {talking}was very important to many.
